dharmaloka widuhal palamu inima - panduwara 44.1 kadi siyalu dena dawi 118 (yugisha dilshan 51, dilip chamara 07/3, nuwantha madhushan 15/2, prawin nimesh 22/2) gurukula widuhal palamu inima - panduwara 60 kadi kadulu 3 k dawi 266 (rashmika mewan nodawi 104, kemira nayanatharu nodawi 90, nuwan chanaka 54) dharmaloka widuhal dewani inima - panduwara 83 kadi kadulu 7 k dawi 199 (subhuthi milshan nodawi 62, lakshitha botheju 28, likshan sasanga 38/2, dilip chamara 42/2, prawin nimesh 55/2 richmand widyalaya asiru adiyaka galla mahinda widyalaya ha richmand widyalaya athara pawathwena 114 wani aadarawanthayange satana warshika krikat tharagawaliye siya palamu inima krida karamin sitina richmand widyalaya palamu dinata tharagaya nathara karana wita kadulu 6 k dawi lakunu 99 k laba sitiyeya.
